org.owasp.esapi.codecs
Class AbstractCodec

java.lang.Object
  org.owasp.esapi.codecs.AbstractCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLEntityCodec
public abstract class AbstractCodec
extends Object
implements Codec

Abstract implementation to ease back porting from 2.0. In 2.0 Codec became a abstract class instead of a interface. Most of this code is snipped from there.

Returns:

                                              char c)

encodeCharacter

public String encodeCharacter(Character c)
Encode a Character with a Codec. This implementation delegates to encodeCharacter(char[],Character) with a empty immune array. either this or encodeCharacter(char[],Character) must be overridden by subclasses.

Specified by:
encodeCharacter in interface Codec
Parameters:
c - the Character to encode
Returns:
the encoded Character

encodeCharacter

public String encodeCharacter(char[] immune,
                              Character c)
Encode a character with immunity. This implementation checks for a immune character and then delegates to encodeCharacter(Character). Either this or encodeCharacter(Character) must be overridden by subclasses.

Parameters:
immune - characters not to encode
Returns:
String representation of the encoded character.

encode

public String encode(char[] immune,
                     String input)
Encode a String so that it can be safely used in a specific context.

Parameters:
immune - characters not to encode
input - the String to encode
Returns:
the encoded String

encode

public String encode(String input)
Encode a String without immunity. This implementation simply delegates to encode(char[], String) with a empty immunity array.

Specified by:
encode in interface Codec
Parameters:
input - the String to encode
Returns:
the encoded String
